galt.description: Please enter your dealer number with Galt to enable this integration. Please contact your Galt representative if you do not know your dealer number
galt.shortDescription: Galt Enterprises, Inc. ('Galt') is proudly celebrating over 40 years in business. For more than a quarter century, Galt and its sister company ServiceGuard Systems, Inc. have offered and administered Extended Service Contracts, GAP products, Credit Life and Disability Insurance, and other related products to the Automotive, Powersports, Trailer, Marine, and RV industries. We continue to offer our A.M. Best A-rated fully insured programs and our F&I Onlinesm Internet-based menu sales system continues as a support tool to our dealers.

lightspeed.description:
1. Please enter your CMF number with Lightspeed to enable this integration.
  2. Once you have enabled the integration here, please follow these instructions to enable the integration within Lightspeed.
lightspeed.shortDescription: Lightspeed, located in Salt Lake City, Utah, specializes in dealership management software solutions across the Powersports, Marine & RV industries. Lightspeed®EVO is the #1 DMS used within the Recreation industry.

rateProducts.protectionProductNote: This summary is intended to provide descriptions and estimated costs of protection products and services available for purchase as part of the transaction. You are NOT required to purchase any of these products to be qualified for financing or to get certain terms for the sale. It is unlawful to require or attempt to require the purchase of any optional add-on product or service. Signing this document does not bind or commit you to proceed with the purchase transaction contemplated herein.

submit.downPayment: How much cash down payment are you willing to make?
submit.maxMonthyPayment: What is your preferred maximum monthly payment?
submit.optionalNotes: Any other optional notes to the dealer?
submit.termsAndCondition: Finally, I/we further represent that I/we have read and agree to the Dealer’s {Privacy Policy} and the {Terms of Use} of this website and agree to be bound thereby.
submit.applicationCompletion: Thank you for your credit application submission!
submit.informationReceived: Your information has been received. Someone will contact you shortly to discuss the next steps in your vehicle purchase with us.
submit.term:
I/We have requested that {OrgName} submit a Credit Application on my/our behalf to one or more Third-Party Financial Institutions. As a consequence thereof, I/we specifically provide my/our consent and authorization to Dealer and any Third-Party Financial Institution(s) as follows:

I/We agree to provide to both Dealer and any Third-Party Financial Institution(s) my/our current address, telephone number, e-mail address upon request and to immediately notify both Dealer and/or any Third-Party Financial Institution(s) of any change in the same. I/we further understand and consent that telephone communications may occur between Dealer, the Third-Party Financial Institution(s) and myself concerning their review and consideration of my/our Credit Application and that the same may be monitored and/or recorded to assure the quality of service. As such, I/we agree and consent to both receiving telephone calls and/or text messages from Dealer, the Third-Party Financial Institution(s), or its third-party debt collector through any telephone number, e-mail address, or through the US Mails, now or in the future. I/we further understand and consent to receiving telephone calls and/or messages that utilize either an auto dialer or prerecorded message. I/we further understand and consent that I/we may incur a charge as a result of calls or messages which utilize either a cellular telephone number or other wireless device. Finally, I/we agree to timely respond to any telephone call/message or electronic communication from Dealer and any Third-Party Financial Institution(s), and my/our failure to do so, may result in the delay or denial of my/our Credit Application.

I/We agree and consent that Dealer and any Third-Party Financial Institution(s) may forward disclosures or other communications to me electronically at the e-mail address I/we have provided. I/we further agree to provide any and all additional documents/information requested by either Dealer and any Third-Party Financial Institution(s) in the timeframe requested as is required for consideration of my/our Credit Application. I/we agree to timely forward any additional document/information requested by either Dealer and/or any Third-Party Financial Institution(s), and my/our failure to do so, may result in the delay or denial of my/our Credit Application. I/we further understand that Federal law requires Financial Institutions to obtain sufficient information to verify my/our identity. As such, I/we agree to answer any questions and/or to provide one or more forms of identification to Dealer and/or any Third-Party Financial Institution(s) considering my/our Credit Application. Finally, I/we understand and authorize Dealer or Third-Party Financial Institution(s) to utilize outside sources to confirm my/our identity as is required for consideration of my/our Credit Application.

Further, I/We authorize and consent to allow Dealer and Third-Party Financial Institution(s) to investigate my/our credit and employment history, which will include Dealer and any Third-Party Financial Institution(s) obtaining credit report(s) from one or more consumer credit reporting agencies understanding that the same may have an adverse effect on my/our credit score.

{financialList}{lender}

By submitting this application, I/we certify and represent that the information provided on the application is, to the best of my/our knowledge, complete and accurate and I/we understand that false statements may subject me to criminal penalties.

I/We agree to provide my/our electronic signature, acknowledge receipt of any Disclosures, and agree to the E-Sign Consent. By submitting this Credit Application, I/we understand that Dealer and the Third-Party Financial Institution(s) will rely on the information contained in my/our Credit Application in considering my/our credit worthiness, and that Dealer and Third-Party Financial Institution(s) will retain my/our Credit Application and relating information concerning me whether this Application is approved or not.
submit.monthlyPaymentLabel: What is your desired maximum monthly payment?
submit.businessTerm: I, {GuarantorName} am a duly authorized representative of {BusinessName} and am authorized to submit the information and consent to the disclosures contained in this credit application on behalf of {BusinessName}.

systemdefaults.title: System Defaults
systemdefaults.resetDefaultDialogTitle: You have chosen to reset system defaults on the {{value}} tab. Are you sure you want to continue?

LinkExpiration.name: Link Expiration
LinkExpiration.description: This setting controls the time interval after which the credit application link sent to the Customer expires in hours.

LenderList.name: Lender List
LenderList.description: This setting controls the names of the lenders that will appear in the disclosures on the credit application to whom the application could be submitted to. Please mention each lender on a separate line.

AllowedDomains.name: Allowed Domains
AllowedDomains.description: This setting controls the domains that are allowed to iframe the credit application.

PrivacyPolicy.name: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.description: This setting controls the link to the Privacy Policy that appears on the credit application.

TermsOfUse.name: Terms Of Use
TermsOfUse.description: This setting controls the link to the Terms of Use that appears on the credit application.

BulkImportPeriod.name: Bulk Import Period
BulkImportPeriod.description: This setting controls the number of days back worth of data that should be bulk imported.

BulkImportTTL.name: Bulk Import TTL
BulkImportTTL.description: This setting controls the number of days we will retain the records since they were last modified.

LightspeedUnitTypeMappings.name: Lightspeed Unit Type Mappings
LightspeedUnitTypeMappings.description: This setting controls how unit types are mapped from Lightspeed DMS.

UnitTypes.name: Unit Types
UnitTypes.description: This setting controls which unit types appear for your organization on the ODL Portal.

InterestRate.name: Interest Rate
InterestRate.description: This setting controls the default interest rate when new deals are created.

DaysToFirstPayment.name: Days To First Payment
DaysToFirstPayment.description: This setting controls the default days to first payment when new deals are created.

Term.name: Term
Term.description: This setting controls the default term when new deals are created.

TermFrequency.name: Term Frequency
TermFrequency.description: This setting controls the default term frequency when new deals are created.

ProductAcceptanceEmail.name: Product Acceptance Email
ProductAcceptanceEmail.description: This setting controls whether an email is sent to the customer once they accept protection products.

Logo.name: Logo
Logo.description: This setting controls the logo that appears for your organization on the ODL portal. Recommended aspect ratio for logo is {{ratio}} and max file size is {{maxSize}}.

SessionTimeout.name: Session Timeout
SessionTimeout.description: This setting controls the session timeout (in minutes) for users belonging to your organization. This can range from 5 to 60 minutes.

LightspeedStoreName.name: Lightspeed Store Name
LightspeedStoreName.description: This setting controls which store customers get imported for when a dealer has multiple locations.

ShowProductCost.name: Show Product Cost
ShowProductCost.description: This setting controls whether the retail customer price of the product shows for each product on the menu when expanded to see the product details.

ShowPayments.name: Show Payments
ShowPayments.description: This setting controls whether the payment shows for each product on the menu when expanded to see the product details. {{note}} this only applies to finance deals.

MenuAcceptanceEmail.name: Menu Acceptance Email
MenuAcceptanceEmail.description: This setting controls whether a confirmation email is sent to the customer once the menu acceptance process is complete.

MenuColumns.name: Menu Columns
MenuColumns.description: This setting controls the configuration of the columns on the menu.
